title: "broken ass champ." - Vayne
body:
Guess who this was a response to?

Yasuo.

Seriously WHEN WILL PEOPLE FREAKING GET OVER IT.

He's not OP anymore.

Literally all I saw the entire match was a Yasuo abusing brush for stealth and dashing around so people can't keep up.

Not a Yasuo who suddenly goes 1v5 and PENTAKILL, which rarely happens if people have CC and focus him.

Man, it's like people are a thousand years behind who's OP and not OP right now.
